posts.postText:
Recently, The Jailbreak server switched hosts after the deal with SleekServers went south.  At first I was just happy to have the server back, and the random lag was accepted because I was simply glad to play Jailbreak.  

But that was a long time ago.  Every staff member I have asked think that our current host is complete CRAP. Lag is now something our players have to live with, and the spikes last over 5 seconds, which is ridiculous.  Add onto that crashes ever day.  I don't know how much is being paid to host our server, but whatever it is, you are paying way too much.  

This is why I am going to urge us to switch hosts.  It may be a pain, it may cost more, but our current host is so bad that it would be worth it.
+Support, the new host is almost becoming unbearable and unplayable due do its random lag spikes and the server crashing like every 3 hours.
+Support on this The New Host i cant Deal with...Were loosing more and more people that come and the lag is being an advantage For some Rdmers
We are actually in the process of moving jail to a VPS but it wasn't announced because we weren't sure if we could do it.

We'll work on it. It's a huge-ass pain to move an entire server, though.
I'll talk to gash and we'll figure something out.
